statements: SELECT * FROM client_interactions;
SELECT client_id, interaction_type FROM client_interactions WHERE interaction_id = 1;
SELECT interaction_id, interaction_datetime, interaction_details FROM client_interactions WHERE client_id = 100;
SELECT * FROM client_interactions WHERE client_id = 50 ORDER BY interaction_datetime DESC;
SELECT client_id, interaction_type, interaction_datetime FROM client_interactions WHERE interaction_type = 'Meeting' ORDER BY interaction_id;
SELECT * FROM client_interactions WHERE client_id = 1 ORDER BY interaction_datetime DESC;
SELECT interaction_id, client_id, interaction_type FROM client_interactions WHERE interaction_type = 'Meeting' ORDER BY interaction_datetime ASC;
SELECT client_id, interaction_type, interaction_details FROM client_interactions WHERE interaction_datetime > '2022-01-01 00:00:00';
SELECT interaction_id, client_id, interaction_datetime FROM client_interactions WHERE client_id = 2 ORDER BY interaction_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM client_interactions WHERE interaction_type = 'Call' AND interaction_details LIKE '%feedback%';
SELECT * FROM client_interactions;
SELECT client_id, interaction_type, interaction_timestamp FROM client_interactions WHERE client_id = 123;
SELECT * FROM inquiries ORDER BY inquiry_timestamp DESC;
SELECT inquiry_id, inquiry_type, inquiry_details FROM inquiries WHERE inquiry_type = 'General Inquiry';
SELECT client_id, interaction_type, interaction_details FROM client_interactions WHERE interaction_timestamp > '2023-01-01';
SELECT * FROM client_interactions WHERE client_id = 1 ORDER BY interaction_timestamp DESC;
SELECT interaction_id, client_id, interaction_type FROM client_interactions WHERE interaction_type = 'Meeting' ORDER BY interaction_timestamp ASC;
SELECT client_id, interaction_timestamp, interaction_details FROM client_interactions WHERE interaction_type LIKE '%Call%' ORDER BY client_id, interaction_timestamp DESC;

SELECT interaction_id, interaction_type, interaction_timestamp FROM client_interactions WHERE interaction_timestamp > '2022-01-01' AND interaction_type != 'Email' ORDER BY client_id DESC, interaction_timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM inquiries WHERE inquiry_type LIKE '%Complaint%' ORDER BY inquiry_timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM client_interactions ORDER BY interaction_timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT interaction_id, interaction_type, interaction_description FROM client_interactions WHERE client_id = 12345;
SELECT client_id, interaction_type, interaction_timestamp FROM client_interactions WHERE interaction_type = 'Meeting';
SELECT * FROM client_inquiries ORDER BY inquiry_timestamp ASC LIMIT 3;
SELECT experience_id, client_id, experience_timestamp, experience_type FROM personalized_experiences WHERE client_id = 67890;
SELECT * FROM client_interactions ORDER BY interaction_timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT client_id, interaction_type FROM client_interactions WHERE interaction_type = 'Meeting' ORDER BY interaction_timestamp ASC;
SELECT client_id, interaction_type, interaction_description FROM client_interactions WHERE client_id = 1001 AND interaction_type = 'Call' ORDER BY interaction_timestamp DESC;

SELECT client_id, interaction_type, interaction_timestamp, interaction_description FROM client_interactions WHERE client_id IN (1002, 1003) AND interaction_type IN ('Meeting', 'Email') ORDER BY interaction_timestamp ASC;

SELECT client_id, interaction_timestamp, interaction_type, interaction_description FROM client_interactions WHERE interaction_timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31' ORDER BY interaction_timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM clients;
SELECT client_name, client_email FROM clients ORDER BY registration_date DESC;
SELECT client_name, client_phone FROM clients WHERE client_id = 1;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM recommendations;
SELECT client_name, client_email, registration_date FROM clients WHERE registration_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM interactions WHERE client_id = 123;
SELECT interaction_id, interaction_date, interaction_description FROM interactions WHERE interaction_type = 'Meeting';
SELECT client_name, client_email FROM clients WHERE registration_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT inquiry_id, inquiry_date, inquiry_description FROM inquiries WHERE inquiry_type = 'Technical';
SELECT * FROM recommendations ORDER BY recommendation_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM client_interactions;
SELECT client_id, interaction_type, interaction_date FROM client_interactions WHERE client_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, activity_type FROM user_activities ORDER BY activity_date DESC;
SELECT client_id, preference FROM personalization_data WHERE category = 'shopping';
SELECT recommendation_type, recommendation_date FROM recommendations WHERE user_id = 5 ORDER BY recommendation_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM client_interactions ORDER BY interaction_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT client_id, interaction_type, interaction_date FROM client_interactions WHERE client_id = 1001;
SELECT client_id, interaction_type, interaction_details FROM client_interactions WHERE interaction_type = 'Meeting';
SELECT client_id, COUNT(*) AS total_interactions FROM client_interactions GROUP BY client_id ORDER BY total_interactions DESC;
SELECT client_id, interaction_type, interaction_date FROM client_interactions WHERE interaction_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY interaction_date ASC LIMIT 5;
